panels.description: An administratively-assigned name for this managed node. By convention, this is the node's fully-qualified domain name

targets.query: SELECT last("uptime") FROM "snmp" WHERE ("host" = 'telegraf') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "hostname" fill(null)

panels.description: The time (in hundredths of a second) since the network management portion of the system was last re-initialized

targets.query: SELECT last("uptime") FROM "snmp" WHERE ("host" = 'telegraf') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "hostname" fill(null)
SELECT last("uptime") FROM "snmp" WHERE ("host" = 'telegraf') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "hostname" fill(null)
SELECT last("uptime") FROM "snmp" WHERE ("host" = 'telegraf') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "hostname" fill(null)
SELECT last("os_version") FROM "Afranet-R5_interfaces" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "hostname"
SELECT last("uptime") FROM "snmp" WHERE ("host" = 'telegraf') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "hostname" fill(null)

SELECT last("uptime") FROM "snmp" WHERE ("host" = 'telegraf') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "hostname" fill(null)

panels.description: The total number of octets transmitted on the interface, including framing characters. Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at re-initialization of the management system, and at other times as indicated by the value of ifCounterDiscontinuityTime

targets.query: SELECT  NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(last("ifOutOctets"), 1s) *8 FROM "YOUR-NAME" WHERE ("ifOperStatus"=1) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "ifName" fill(none)

panels.title: Send Rate

panels.description: The total number of octets received on the interface, including framing characters. Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at re-initialization of the management system, and at other times as indicated by the value of ifCounterDiscontinuityTime

targets.query: SELECT  NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(last("ifInOctets"), 1s) *8 FROM "YOUR-NAME" WHERE ("ifOperStatus"=1) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "ifName" fill(none)

panels.title: Receive Rate

panels.description: An entry containing management information applicable to a particular interface
panels.title: Port Summary
